I donâ€™t want a back on forth on this topic but this does not align with my discussion with him and his feelings. He shares and I listen.
As you noted, the boys may feel pressure to please you which is definitely a pattern in this family.

So... I sent them a group text. I apologized for the digital footprint mail. Said they have every right to be mad at me. And I understood that when they
were acting nice. it was only to not hurt my feelings.

metadata.section: I will be a good father to our son.
